ResearchProjectDef.label: orsimer armoury
ResearchProjectDef.description:
Allows the construction of Orsimer weapons and armour at a forge.

As the Orsimer greatly prefer function over form, the equipment appears somewhat primitive and barbaric, especially when compared to equipment of Aldmeri design.

Owing to this preference, the equipment is easier and cheaper to forge, and provides increased protection and damage, at the cost of increased weight and an end product that is rather ugly.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orsimer heavy armoury
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of heavy Orsimer weapons at a forge.\n\nWhile these weapons are capable of causing devastating damage, something about them makes the wielder act recklessly. Heavy weapons increase all damage taken by 10%, whilst dual weapons increase all damage taken by 15%.

ResearchProjectDef.label: orsimer totems
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of Orsimer totems at a forge. These totems are attached to the belt, and modify an Orsimers beserker rage.
